compatibility.notes: The AFL-2.1 license allows users to modify the code and distribute it under their own license terms, with no obligation to open-source the derivative work.

key_requirements: Retain the notice immediately following the copyright notice for the Original Work
Not use the names of the Licensor, contributors, or their trademarks without express prior written permission
license.name: AFL-2.1
obligations: Provide a machine-readable copy of the Source Code with each copy of the Original Work
Notify the public of the availability and location of the Source Code repository
